# Blog do código
> Um blog simples em Node.js
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "blog-do-codigo",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Um blog simples em Node.js",
  "main": "server.js",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "nodemon server.js",
    "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1"
  },
  "license": "ISC",
  "dependencies": {
    "accesscontrol": "^2.2.1",
    "bcrypt": "^3.0.0",
    "body-parser": "^1.19.0",
    "dotenv": "^8.2.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "express": "^4.17.1",
    "jsonwebtoken": "^8.5.1",
    "moment": "^2.26.0",
    "nodemailer": "^6.4.8",
    "nodemon": "^2.0.2",
    "passport": "^0.4.1",
    "passport-http-bearer": "^1.0.1",
    "passport-local": "^1.0.0",
    "redis": "^3.0.2",
    "sqlite3": "^4.1.1"
  }
}
